channel.title: BSNL Free Data
channel.description: BSNL Free Data Tricks including BSNL Free Internet Tricks, BSNL unlimited plans, BSNL unlimited data tips & tricks, BSNL free 4G data

item.title: BSNL free unlimited internet trick [using Cloudflare Warp] 2020

Hi everyone, this is exclusive trick that we found from another forum.

Lets start without wasting time:

  1. First download Cloudflare Warp from Google play
  2. That's all connect it using BSNL internet
  3. Enjoy unlimited data.
[/HIDEREPLY]

But you need to purchase license for Cloudflare Warp for unlimited data, but don't worry I have a license for you.

item.title: Bharat Fiber High-Speed (FTTH) Broadband Services by BSNL
item.author: invalid@example.com (Elliott)
item.dc:creator: Elliott
item.content:encoded:
BSNL state owned company has launched its fibre plan FTTH inorder to compete with Airtel and JIO fibre.

Bsnl is providing internet at very low cost ie rs 1.1 per GB.

How to buy BSNL fibre and installation, proper police and plans are still pending from operator. As soon as we get the prices, will update this thread.

Till then, lets stick to your current broadband service.

item.title: Aircel May Shut Down Services, Sell Assets to Larger Telco: Report
item.author: invalid@example.com (l0n3ly)
item.dc:creator: l0n3ly
item.content:encoded:
Is it true news ?

Aircel May Shut Down Services, Sell Assets to Larger Telco: Report:
Struggling GSM player Aircel may slowly shut down services in the country, following a failed attempt at merging operations with Anil Ambani-led Reliance Communications (RCom), the Economic Times reported on Tuesday. The telco, which has a gross debt of some Rs. 20,000 crore, is likely to sell its wireless assets, excluding spectrum, to a larger telecom service provider.
According to the ET report, Aircel...

Aircel May Shut Down Services, Sell Assets to Larger Telco: Report

item.title: Jio limiting voice calls to 300 minutes per day for some users: Report
item.author: invalid@example.com (hack4u)
item.dc:creator: hack4u
item.content:encoded:
Reliance Jio is seemingly limiting the calls that its users can make using VoLTE on its network 300 minutes per day for some users who are apparently misusing the "unlimited calls" feature. This limit, according to reports, will not be available to all users, but only for those who are found misusing the network.
The Jio Priority team has confirmed to Telecomtalk that they're limiting the voice calls to 300 minutes per day for some users...

Jio limiting voice calls to 300 minutes per day for some users: Report

item.title: Reliance Jio alert: Prime service to remain free for 1 more year; new users to pay Rs 99
item.author: invalid@example.com (hack4u)
item.dc:creator: hack4u
item.content:encoded:
Existing members get an extra year of Prime membership for no additional fee!
Reliance Industries Limited's telecom venture Reliance Jio has extended its Prime membership benefits for its customers for one more year.
As per a release from Jio, "All Jio PRIME members who have subscribed to the exclusive membership benefits till 31st March 2018 will get another year of complimentary PRIME benefits at NO additional fee"

It further states that for, "new Jio users, the Jio...

Reliance Jio alert: Prime service to remain free for 1 more year; new users to pay Rs 99

item.title: BSNL Offers 4 GB Data Per Day At Rs. 444 With Validity Of 90 days.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rajiv Deshmukh)
item.dc:creator: Rajiv Deshmukh
item.content:encoded:
Amid a highly competitive telecom landscape after the entry of Jio, BSNL or Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited has announced a new 3G mobile data offer priced at Rs. 444 for its prepaid users. Called 'BSNL Chaukka - 444', the promotional prepaid pack offers 4GB of data per day with a validity of 90 days. Reliance Jio's free voice call offers and aggressive data tariffs have intensified competition in the Indian market, with incumbent telecom operators announcing tariff cuts.

Here's what BSNL is...

BSNL Offers 4 GB Data Per Day At Rs. 444 With Validity Of 90 days.

item.title: BSNL Offering an FRC 7 Tariff Plan With Rs. 60 Talktime and 500MB Data for MNP Subscribers
item.author: invalid@example.com (l0n3ly)
item.dc:creator: l0n3ly
item.content:encoded:
Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) is now welcoming the subscribers of Reliance Communications (RCom), Docomo, Telenor to join its network as the three operators will be soon shutting down their business. BSNL has introduced a first recharge plan of Rs. 7, which is valid for all the customers who’re looking to port into BSNL network.
The FRC 7 tariff plan from BSNL gives Rs. 60 talktime and 500MB...

BSNL Offering an FRC 7 Tariff Plan With Rs. 60 Talktime and 500MB Data for MNP Subscribers

item.title: Jio announces triple cashback offer for Jio Prime members
item.author: invalid@example.com (l0n3ly)
item.dc:creator: l0n3ly
item.content:encoded:
Reliance Jio on Thursday introduced a variety of ’Prime Benefits for all JIO Prime customers, including triple cashback of up to Rs 2,599 on every recharge of Rs 399 or above.
The triple cashback offer includes 100 per cent cashback vouchers of JIO worth Rs 400 on every Jio tariff plan recharge of Rs 399 or above and instant cashback of up to Rs 300 on every recharge by JIO’s partner...

Jio announces triple cashback offer for Jio Prime members

item.title: BSNL USSD Codes To Check BSNL Balance, Data & Offers
item.author: invalid@example.com (pritamkrish)
item.dc:creator: pritamkrish
item.content:encoded:
List Of BSNL USSD Codes 2017

Details BSNL USSD Codes
Bsnl balance check ussd codes *123#
Bsnl Internet balance check code *124#
Bsnl (know) own number check code *222#
Bsnl minute balance check ussd codes *123*5#
Bsnl FnF number enquiry code 124*6#
Internet Data *124#
Bsnl customer care number 1503′ Number ‘1800-180-1503’
Bsnl call detail check code *124#
Balance & Validity *123*1#
Minutes Balance *123*2#
SMS Balance *123*1# or *123*5#...

BSNL USSD Codes To Check BSNL Balance, Data & Offers

item.title: Xiaomi Mi MIX 2s {LEAKED} •iPhone X Look•
item.author: invalid@example.com (Darksider)
item.dc:creator: Darksider
item.content:encoded:
A leakster from China has revealed couple of images of a rumored bezel-less phone called Xiaomi Mi MIX 2s. The alleged phone looks like a modified version of the Mi MIX 2 and it also bears resemblance with the Apple iPhone X.

The Xiaomi Mi MIX 2 has the selfie camera located on the bottom bezel of the smartphone. The slim bottom bezel of the phone is visible in one of the...​

Xiaomi Mi MIX 2s {LEAKED} •iPhone X Look•

item.title: BSNL to Offer 50% Cashback and Full Talk Time on Some of the Recharge Plans This Dussehra
item.author: invalid@example.com (shameemkdy)
item.dc:creator: shameemkdy
item.content:encoded:
BSNL confirmed that this offer will run between September 25 and October 25. Customers whoever recharge with the Rs. 42, Rs. 44, Rs. 65, Rs. 69, Rs. 88, and Rs. 122 talk time packs will receive 50% cashback under the new promotional offer. That said, only the above-mentioned plans will be available in the offer.

Also, BSNL confirmed that the full talk time offer on its website will be valid only on the Rs. 30 recharge. That said, BSNL did not reveal how many times a customer can recharge...

BSNL to Offer 50% Cashback and Full Talk Time on Some of the Recharge Plans This Dussehra

item.title: BSNL 3G Data with 3GB/DAY for 90 Days @333
item.author: invalid@example.com (KRATO$)
item.dc:creator: KRATO$
item.content:encoded:
​
BSNL's new Triple Ace plan for mobile customers is priced at Rs. 333 offers unlimited data with 3G speed up to 3GB/day which'll remain valid for 90 days.

This means you can enjoy a total of 270GB high speed 3G data at Rs. 333, or just Rs. 1.23 per GB.
Notably, BSNL customers on this plan will be limited to 3G speeds...

BSNL 3G Data with 3GB/DAY for 90 Days @333

item.title: The new Mi 5 Extreme
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jabong)
item.dc:creator: Jabong
item.content:encoded:
The new Mi 5 Extreme comes with some serious improvements over its predecessor

Processor
It features a 2.15GHz Snapdragon 820 processor , Adreno 530 GPU, and 3GB RAM. The CPU is overclocked by 19% to 2.15GHz from 1.8GHz, GPU runs at 624MHz instead of 510MHz , and RAM is overclocked to 1866MHz from 1333MHz...​

The new Mi 5 Extreme

item.title: Activation of Bsnl sim in roaming [Help]
item.author: invalid@example.com (wmnitin)
item.dc:creator: wmnitin
item.content:encoded:
I purchased a BSNL sim from Uttar pradesh west. But after purchasing i came to delhi, at that time sim was not activated. Now after 7 days my BSNL sim is showing towers but i am unable to call 1503 as i am in roaming. I have to call this number for sim card activation.

Is there any way to activate sim in delhi or i have to go to uttarpradesh again ?
